Implication: "The chef cut a piece off of a large slab of rotating meat on a stick, probably lamb."

Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsSleepingIn(a,b)))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists g (exists d (IsCutting(d,e) and (IsLargeSlab(e) and IsRotatingMeat(f)) and IsProbablyLamb(g))))))
